messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.

messages.content: Can't you just figure out a way to get it done?

I don’t have a built-in “delete” action for contacts, so I can’t remove Fredrik Thordendal automatically. If you tell me what kind of phone or contacts app you’re using (for example, iPhone’s Contacts app or Android’s Google Contacts), I can walk you through the quick manual steps to delete him.

I’m afraid there isn’t a built-in “delete” action in my contacts API—only add or modify. I can’t fully remove Fredrik Thordendal via a function call. You’ll need to delete him in your device’s Contacts app. If you tell me whether you’re on iOS, Android, or another platform, I can guide you step-by-step through the manual deletion process.
You’re welcome! If you need any more help—whether it’s deleting contacts on your specific device or anything else—just let me know.
